DOC.brief_summary: With rapid grow age population , age-related eye disease include cataract become prevalent . The demand cataract surgery post-surgical care pose enormous financial burdens government . Lycium barbarum contain lutein zeaxanthin filter phototoxic blue light neutralize reactive oxygen specie , thus provide protective effect cataract formation . This study aim determine effect Lycium barbarum Supplements progression senile cataract Hong Kong Chinese elderly .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Lycium Barbarum Supplements Progression Senile Cataract Hong Kong Chinese Population
